featured.text: They can be round like the moon, long like a jackknife, or shaped like boxes, fans, or tops.
On the front apron, there is often a kilt pin, topped with a small decorative family symbol.
The tower, of pinewood, will be built on eight pillars and will be topped with a flower of five metal petals of 700 square meters each.

definition.example: She placed the star on top of the Christmas tree.
